item.title: Minecraft Fabric Modding Tutorial #6 Language Recipes Tooltip
item.description: Language We had added an item, an item group, and a block, but they do not have a name yet. Here, We can use a language file to provide a name for them. We can create a language file en_us.json under the path assets/awesome/lang, it is an English language file. { "item.awesome.end_heart": "End Heart", "item.awesome.end_heart_block": "End Heart Block", "block.awesome.end_heart_block": "End Heart Block", "itemGroup.awesome.item_group": "Awesome" } Recipes The recipe is used to craft an item, Here, We can configure the recipe of the item.

item.title: Minecraft Fabric Modding Toturial #1 Setup a Development Environment
item.description: Install JDK Since the latest(1.20.6) Minecraft only supports JDK21, so we need to install JDK21, here I choose to download Libreica OpenJDK 21. Choose Full JDK and click the file with the suffix msi to download if you are using Windows, double-click to install after downloading. Install Intellij IDEA Here I choose to download Intellij IDEA Community, choose the Community version. Double-click to install after downloading if you are using Windows.
